channel.title: AtomicNicos's Blog at the end of the universe
channel.description: A blog talking all things infosec, IoT, development and personal

item.title: Dissecting the Central-Infosec Python challenges
item.description: This is a write-up of the "07. Reversing: Code Analysis (CIS-WEBSRV01)" series of challenges in the context of the Central Infosec CTF.

item.title: Dissecting the Central-Infosec Static Code Analysis challenge
item.description: This is a write-up for the hardest of the "14. Web Exploitation: Advanced (CIS-WEBSRV01)" series of challenges in the context of the Central Infosec CTF.

item.title: Dissecting the Central-Infosec Game Exploitation challenge
item.description: This is a write-up for the hardest of the "13. Web Exploitation: Games (CIS-WEBSRV01)" series of challenges in the context of the Central Infosec CTF.

item.title: Central-Infosec CTF: The story, and the links!
item.description: This is a recap of my participation in the Central Infosec CTF with "Advanced Persistent Team".

item.title: A much ado about passwords and password management
item.description: Going over various (non-)solutions people use to store their passwords and the appeal of password management solutions.

item.description: A write-up on my participation in the TraceLabs OSINT CTF.
